description:
Ran accompanies Akiyama to the hospital after she is attacked while Kogoro and the others continue visiting the checkpoints. After arriving at the Kanazawa 21st Century Museum, Conan chckes the four cards that fell out of Akiyama`s bag.
Source: crunchyroll
